text: Aji Sax ji tiiñal na njiiti Israayil
Xanaa du yeena wara xam yoon?
Yeenay fees sama ñoñ te ñuy dund,
yeenay rocci suux wi sàng seeni yax.
Lee tax noggatukat yii di woo Aji Sax ji wall,
kanamam la leen di làq, bésub keroog,
Aji Sax ji artu na yonent yu bëgge yi
Lii la Aji Sax ji wax ci yonent yiy lajjal samay bokk:
«Bu ñu sàqamee ab lanc, yéene jàmm;
ku leen leelul, ñu waajal xare.
Moo tax yeen, guddi moo leen di ñeel, ba peeñu réer,
lëndëm a leen di dikkal, ba am ngis tukkil leen,
Teewul man, may fees ak doole,
fees ak noowug Aji Sax ji,
ngir tuddal \w bànni Israayil|bànni Israayil:\w* googu moyam.
Aji Sax ji tiiñalaat na njiiti Israayil
Ngalla dégluleen lii, yeen njiiti kër \w Yanqóoba|Yanqóoba:\w*;
Seeni njiit, alalu ger lañuy àttee,
seeni \w sarxalkat|sarxalkat b-:\w* di feyeeku am njàngale,
seeni yonent di weccikoo xaalis seenum ngisaane,
te Aji Sax ji lañuy dëgërloo, naan:
«Xanaa du Aji Sax jaa ngi ci sunu biir?
Kon nag yeena tax dees na gàbb Siyoŋ nib tool,
tundu kërug Yàlla gaay doon gajj bu kawe.
